questions.question_text: A user has a CAD / CAM workstation that is to be reconfigured into a Gaming PC. Which of the following would be the EASIEST and MOST effective upgrade?

discussion.content: why do i need better sound card for games??

comments.content: Surround sound is one of the requirements whenever it comes to a gaming PC.

questions.question_text: A group of users need to connect directly to a printer with continuous access. Which of the following connection types will achieve this?

discussion.content: you cant use a USB to connect to printer for group of users unless using shared printer on the network . so (B) Ethernet is the most correct answer .

questions.question_text: A PC has been randomly rebooting several times a day. The technician checks the case for overheating and finds the fans appear to be operating normally. Which of the following should the technician check NEXT?

discussion.content: It is not logical next step but only reasonable on list

choices.C: The embedded NIC to ensure it has the latest firmware and drivers
choices.A: The motherboard for any sign of swollen capacitors
choices.B: The disk drive to determine if it is defragmented and operating properly
choices.D: The RAM to confirm it is the correct type for the motherboard being used

discussion.content: I guess 1 for the host and 3 for virtual machines.

questions.question_text: A customer needs to run 3 virtual machines on their software design workstation. Which of the following CPUs would be MOST cost effective for this task?

comments.content: It's tricky and confusing but CD is the only option on the list that is least expensive and can hold upto 750 mb data.
You can write a video on CD. Years ago I would record Futurama on CDs. One CD would hold only three episodes, but it definitely worked.

questions.question_text: A user wants to store a personal video to view at a later time. Which of the following types of media is the LEAST expensive with a maximum capacity of 750MB?
